channel.title: Offsite Games Discussion / Signups or Replacements
channel.description:
Thread to post signups and / or discuss offsite games. Social deduction is a tight-knit community that needs to help eachother out sometimes; I've also realised a recent influx in off-site games needing replacements/signups as it's nearing Christmas which is why this thread was made.
Please post the request you make in this thread alongside a link to your game (ect. WoW:BfA v2, https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/standard-wow-bfa-v2-alliance-victory-2-16/82340/, needs 6 replacements)

item.title: Offsite Games Discussion / Signups or Replacements

item.description:

https://hypixel.net/threads/hypixel-mafia-i-a-forgotten-temple-day-2.3644395/

Requesting: One replacement
On Hypixel Forums (Custom XenForo forums)

sulit’s note: “It has actually experienced players this time
I swear”

Read full topic
